Package game

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
game.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Thread
In a newly created game, an instance of the GameBoard class is created in which the deck of cards is created and a winner of the game is determined by creating and running instances of the Round class until one player has won. It also determines the player who begins each round (first date date/ last winner of round)

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(User user)
      If the user which disconnected is a player in the playerList, he gets removed from it. If the player is currently in a round, he gets removed from it in activeRound.removePlayer().
      Parameters:
      user - the user which disconnects
